bibl.title: A Mirror Text of Thucydides VII 33-35.
bibl.note: P. Yale I, 19 (= P. Ct. YBR Inv. 360, ex P. Yale Inv. 360; II C.E.) contains portions of THUCYDIDES VII, 34, 8-35, 2; 36, 4-5). The verso has a reversed, offset image of an additional portion of VII, 33, 6-34, 2 and 34, 8-35, 2. The entirety is published here, verso followed by recto.
bibl.seg: BABCOCK Robert G. and Stephen EMMEL, A Mirror Text of Thucydides VII 33-35.
ArchPF 43 (1997) pp. 239-245, 2 figg. et pll. I-II.

P. Yale I, 19 (= P. Ct. YBR Inv. 360, ex P. Yale Inv. 360; II C.E.) contains portions of THUCYDIDES VII, 34, 8-35, 2; 36, 4-5). The verso has a reversed, offset image of an additional portion of VII, 33, 6-34, 2 and 34, 8-35, 2. The entirety is published here, verso followed by recto.
